sn35.154:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn35.154:4.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.154:4.4: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, indriyasampanno hotī”ti?
sn35.154:5.1: “Cakkhundriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayānupassī viharanto cakkhundriye nibbindati … pe …
sn35.154:5.2: jivhindriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayānupassī viharanto jivhindriye nibbindati … pe …
sn35.154:5.3: manindriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayānupassī viharanto manindriye nibbindati.
sn35.154:5.6: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
